1. John William Strutt, 3rdJohn William Strutt, 3rd Baron RayleighBaron Rayleigh Born: November 12, 1842Born: November 12, 1842 Died: June 30, 1919Died: June 30, 1919 Greatest Accomplishment was the discovery of Argon …I may say thst in my opinion true Science and true Religion neither are could be opposed…
